description: PodNetworkConnectivityCheckCondition represents the overall status of the pod network connectivity.

lastTransitionTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

message.description: Message indicating details about last transition in a human readable format.

reason.description: Reason for the condition's last status transition in a machine readable format.
